CustomField.formula: OR(CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c , 'gmail') , CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'att'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'ymail'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'cox'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'msn'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'netscape'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'yahoo'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'verizon'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c , 'comcast'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'aol'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'sbcglobal'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c ,'bellsouth'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c , 'hotmail'), CONTAINS(Main_Contact_Email__c , 'outlook'))
CustomField.label: Generic Email
